title: I'm not getting ANY chests!
body:
Okay so I've played at least 20 games in the past 2 or 3 weeks where people on my team have gotten S- or higher?
1) I seem to never get an S q-q
2) I have not gotten a SINGLE chest, and i am barely getting key frags. all my chests are available to achieve too
is this happening to anyone else?
**plshelp**

replies.body: There are a few more requirements to be eligble for a chest.  For example, other players who earn an S- or higher need to be in a premade group with you.  You also need to own the champion you are playing to earn a chest for them.  More information is also available in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!
